SELECT AB_NO, TO_CHAR(AB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "AB_DATE", APC_NO, AB_AMOUNT, AB_MEMO FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE ID=#{id} AND APC_NO!=0 AND AB_DATE=#{abDate} AND AB_DELETE='N' AND AB_VIEW='Y'
SELECT AB_NO, TO_CHAR(AB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "AB_DATE", AEC_NO, AB_AMOUNT, AB_MEMO FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE ID=#{id} AND AEC_NO!=0 AND AB_DATE=#{abDate} AND AB_DELETE='N' AND AB_VIEW='Y'

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AB_DATE) "AB_MONTH", SUM(AB_AMOUNT) "ABM_SUM" FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE ID=#{id} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AB_DATE)=#{year} AND APC_NO!=0 AND AB_DELETE='N' AND AB_VIEW='Y' GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AB_DATE)

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AB_DATE) "AB_MONTH", SUM(AB_AMOUNT) "ABM_SUM" FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE ID=#{id} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AB_DATE)=#{year} AND AEC_NO!=0 AND AB_DELETE='N' AND AB_VIEW='Y' GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AB_DATE)

SELECT AEC_TITLE FROM (SELECT B.AEC_NO "AEC_NO", AEC_TITLE, SUM(AB_AMOUNT) "AB_SUM" FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK B JOIN A_EXPENDITURE_CATEGORY E ON(B.AEC_NO=E.AEC_NO) WHERE ID=#{id} AND B.AEC_NO!=0 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AB_DATE)=#{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AB_DATE)=#{month} AND AB_DELETE='N' AND AB_VIEW = 'Y' AND B.AEC_NO != 11 AND B.AEC_NO != 12 AND B.AEC_NO != 16 GROUP BY B.AEC_NO, AEC_TITLE ORDER BY AB_SUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
